article_title: Challenger Brannon critical of Sen. Burr on voting pattern
article_text:

og.description: Cary Republican Greg Brannon, running for the U.S. Senate against two-term incumbent Richard Burr of Winston-Salem in the GOP primary March 15, recently pointed out what he says is a voting pattern aimed at camouflaging Burr’s not-so-conservative tendencies.
